Marketing H3

Programmer Bags

Header 2

I suggest you try it again, Luke. This time, let go your conscious self and act on instinct. The Force is strong with this one. I have you now. A tremor in the Force. The last time I felt it was in the presence of my old master. I want to come with you to Alderaan. There's nothing for me here now. I want to learn the ways of the Force and be a Jedi, like my father before me.

CUSTOM BAG FEATURES:

  • Embroidery options for up to 3 sides of the bag.
  • Foam padding throughout the inside and hard plastic on the outside to protect your equipment.
  • Commercial grade materials.
  • 8 zipper pockets for literature and product storage
  • Our Watts Baggs exclusive wheel system
  • Customizable interior with removable/adjustable divider system

CPS/Scout Pro Info

Our most popular bag sizes. These customizable bags give you the ability to make a bag perfectly suited for your needs, products, and supplies. Our Sales Bags have been designed and improved over the last two decades by active Medical Sales Reps.

"Our sports medicine department recently ordered 6 bags from Watts and we have been very pleased with what we received. The bags were hand made for us in just two weeks, with custom embroidery on the top and front. Watts was able to accommodate every request we made quickly and affordably.""

Mike McNulty -Chicago Cubs

Building custom bags since 82'

Professional Bags for Professional People

Our founder, Alice Avis, is a 3rd generation seamstress. In 1982, she started Watts Baggs as a way to provide for her growing family. Alice's talents, creativity, and ability to design custom bags made her products superior to what was available in the market. Alice had a vision of building a company that could provide not only for her family but others in the community. She always tried to employ mothers that needed help to support their own families. Today, Watts Baggs is still a privately owned family business that follows Alice's original vision. Read More...
